attributes.action: abolish the entire concept of copyright and patent on the grounds that that which cannot be  physically held cannot thus be owned by any individual or any group of individuals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are fed up of people receiving monies and rewards for work produced several years ago. Eg music... written word... etc. These people live on the backs of us who have to work daily recreating our finished products and are wetting their pants at our naivety. For instance, musicians should make their living by live performance NOT by sales of works recorded many years previously unless that sale consists solely of the medium on which the work is reproduced. Ie the CD is a physical and tangible object and can thus be owned BUT the sounds emanating from the playing the CD should be freely available via the public domain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
